DOC.brief_summary: This study measure sublingual microcirculation patient kidney transplant use MicroScan . The data compare data health volunteer end stage renal disease patient hemodialysis .
DOC.detailed_description: This study measure sublingual microcirculation patient kidney transplant use MicroScan . The data compare data health volunteer end stage renal disease patient hemodialysis . The microcirculation date include total small vessel density , perfuse small vessel density , proportion perfuse vessel , microvascular flow index , heterogeneity index .
DOC.criteria: patient kidney transplant one month Body mass index ( BMI ) < 18.5 > 30 diagnosis sepsis trauma , admit intensive care unit within one month enrollment body temperature < 35.5 > 37.5 Celsius patient tongue resection nonnative speaker
